data.title: Maria Cristina o Savoy
data.text:
Blessed Maria Cristina o Savoy (Maria Cristina Carlotta Giuseppa Gaetana Efisia; 14 November 1812 – 21 Januar 1836) wis the first wife o Ferdinand II o the Twa Sicilies. She died as a result o bairnbirth. On 10 Julie 1872 she wis declared tae be a "Servant o God" on 6 Mey 1937.

In Genoa on 21 November 1832, Maria Cristina mairit Ferdinand II o the Twa Sicilies. Maria Cristina wis descrived as bonnie but timid an shy an aw: modest an reserved, she wis niver comfortable at the ryal coort. Her relationship tae Ferdinand wisna blythe.

Francis II o the Twa Sicilies 16 Januar 1836 – 27 December 1894) mairit Duchess Marie Sophie in Bavarie an haed issue.

14 November 1812 – 21 November 1832: Her Ryal Highness Princess Maria Cristina o Savoy.

21 November 1832 – 21 Januar 1836: Her Majesty The Queen o the Twa Sicilies.
